website_summaries.verdict: This supplement is effective for active people of all ages.
pros: Simply add to a cup of coffee to see improvements in the ease of your golf game or morning jog
Reviews report this supplement can reduce pain caused by high-impact activity
cons: The right meal plan may be needed to help the digestion of this supplement

website_summaries.verdict: This super-versatile powder gets results. Users report dramatic, positive changes with consistent use.
pros: Broad benefits inside and outside – skin, hair, nails, joints
Can be mixed with water or into foods
cons: Excessive protein can cause GI distress (gas, bloating, diarrhea) in some users

customer_reviews.title: This product cured my constant hunger and cravings 100%!
customer_reviews.text: I try new products monthly. My cupboards are full of 'miracle cures' that were useless to me. This product is the happy exception! From the first time I used it, I noticed a difference in my eating patterns and cravings. I've been taking this product for a few weeks and the effects have been transformational. It tamed my constant hunger and cravings for sugar to the point I have no interest in desert even when it's in front of me. I feel very satisfied with small, healthy, simple meals. No more processed food. No more diet soda. No more carbs and salty snacks. Thank you for this true miracle in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Davidovich

customer_reviews.title: Eat this.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a full month before leaving a review, just finished the last scoop yesterday. I put it in my coffee every morning, never noticed an aftertaste and it dissolved easily. But let me tell you, I would straight up lick it off the floor even if it tasted like cat litter because my hair and nails are so glorious. I don't hate my skin! I am mid 40s people, this is a game changer. Skipping the $35 bottle of oil of old lady and throwing more of this down my gullet.
customer_reviews.author: Javaphile

customer_reviews.title: Gas & bloating, so start small
customer_reviews.text: Experienced crazy gas & bloating, so I dropped down to 1/4 scoop for about 4-5 days, then increased to 1/2 a scoop for another 5 days...etc til i got to a full scoop. Giving my system a chance to get used to it really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had known of this product 20 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known of this product 20 years ago. Most of my aches are gone and the deep lines and crepe paper skin are fading away.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Butler

customer_reviews.title: I have been using your collagen peptides for well over ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using your collagen peptides for well over a year now as an occasional supplement on those days when I struggled to meet my protein goals. I noticed that my knees were feeling less achy and more mobile. Recently I suffered a scaled burn to my head, face and shoulder. The Dr said to eat more protein. I used my collagen peptides twice a day and healed in 1 week! I'm convinced that your product helped me heal quickly (1 week vs 3 weeks) and without any scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Curran-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Tightens the skin wonderfully especially if you are losing weight
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says! Tightens the skin wonderfully especially if you are losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Kampamba

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For Joint Pain! There Are Skin Benefits, Too!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a little over 2 months and I must say, I am amazed by the results! I started taking this for knee pain, but I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly the texture and tone of my skin improved. After about 4 weeks, the pain in my knee was gone! Two weeks later, I noticed an improvement in the texture of my skin. Living in the desert and having eczema, I have dealt with the driest of dry skin! I've tried every dry skin lotion out there. This has completely changed how my skin looks and feels! I finally look hydrated instead of ashy & dry. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Caused my entire body to break out in a rash and also severe acne on my face which I have NEVER had before. I finished almost the entire tub before I finally deduced it down to this product causing the problems... I stopped it about 2 weeks ago and finally everything is almost back to normal completely.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Burkhead

customer_reviews.title: Not All there
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product 3 times. The last two times the container was only 1/2 full. So I looked on the specs and it said there should be 41 scoops. Well when I got my third shipment I measured it out and there were only 32 scoops. I think this is a good product or I would not have bought it again, but I don't like to pay for something I'm not getting. I hope the manufacturer will pay attention. If I'm supposed to get 41 scoops, then I expect to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Fabkam

customer_reviews.title: Ageless at 62!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the bomb Diggity bomb! I have been taking it for two months and I feel better all over. I know everyone is entitled to their opinion ,but I don't know how anyone can give this a bad review not only has my hair and nails grown my knees stop aching. Go out and get this because it really works. Look at my cheeks😊
customer_reviews.author: Francine GibbsAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product CHANGED MY LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Product has CHANGED MY LIFE! I had knee, hip, joint pain, that is lessened to the point of non existence with this product. I also have suffered from Cystic acne for many years. No amount of diet change, water intake, medicine or acne products have helped. Since taking this product, my acne is minimal, and the acne doesn't turn into cysts. My skin glows! I have gone a few months without taking this product and all my issues came back. I will now NEVER go without this product again. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsS03

customer_reviews.title: Awful digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: Having discovered Vital Proteins Collagen peptides, I was thrilled with the results. When I found Sports Research's product I was excited to find a comparable product at a much more affordable price. I was sadly very disappointed. Sports Research's product has messed with my digestive system in a horrible way. I've had horrible gas, diarrhea, constant stomach aches. I continued using the product because I experienced gas with the vital proteins, but it went away after a few days of my system accepting the peptides. Not with this. I gave up after 2 weeks. I'll be going back to the Vital Proteins product.
customer_reviews.author: Tigergal67

customer_reviews.title: Made me super ill to the point where my body wanted to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this product. Made me super ill to the point where my body wanted to throw it up. I didn’t see anyone else have the same reactions in the reviews prior to purchasing until I searched for it and I’m not the only one who had the same experience. Will be purchasing another brand. Aside from that, it has no taste and does mix well into hot beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cobb

customer_reviews.title: The container was almost empty.
customer_reviews.text: The Product is good, but they came less than the half in the container.I bought for second time and was almost empty again. This is not fare.
customer_reviews.author: Edith González,NY

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this - it is high quality
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my brain fog, memory problems, digestive problems, etc. I highly recommend this - it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner and was starting to have alot of hip pain. I decided to give this a go and have not been disappointed. I run 5 miles a day and have noticed great improvement in my joint pain. I will say the first few weeks of using it my face freaked out with acne, but it cleared right up. Will definitely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it real
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I am a real skeptic. I became interested in collagen when my chiropractor recommended it to rebuild my torn tissue. You see, my job requires a lot from my body as well as I push myself in other areas. Anyway, after reading many reviews, I decided to purchase this one and another. I've used up nearly both of them now. I'm not sure about my torn tissue but I've been told lately I look younger. The attached picture is with no makeup. Still can't believe I would post a pic with no makeup but I wanted it to be real. Needless to say, I'll be keeping this stuff stocked. How old am I? 47
customer_reviews.author: M. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second container as this product really works. I notice a difference in my skin and nails after 21 days
customer_reviews.author: Terri S. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Powder is clumpy when mixed into drink
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with my previous order of this product so ordered again. However, this time I noticed that the powder was clumpy when put in my drink. I went back to look at my first order and saw they included an experiation date of July 2019. The second purchase did not have an expiration date so I believe I was sent an expired product and it has gone bad. I've included pictures of both packages for proof - Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Y.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I developed terrible diarrhea that lasted three weeks after I stopped taking it. Beware! I would not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: READ IF YOU HAVE ANXIETY/DEPRESSION
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this will prevent someone from what I’ve been through. Do not take it if you are prone or have mood disorders like anxiety or depression. COLLAGEN LOWERS SEROTONIN and caused me SEVERE anxiety attacks very shortly after I started consuming a scoop of it each morning. I’ve never had them this intense, painful, frequent and long lasting before. I got so depressed, fearful, foggy brain, couldn’t concentrate, heart racing, breathless, sweaty. Off the charts anxiety attacks, like I’ve never experienced before. I finally made the connection. Be very, very careful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia G.

customer_reviews.title: As someone who suffers from extremely sensitive acne/rash/infection prone skin ...
customer_reviews.text: As someone who suffers from extremely sensitive acne/rash/infection prone skin, I was unsure of how well this product would work for me. This product has become part of my daily routine and has dramatically improved my skin, joints, and overall health/well-being. Do not quit using this product if you do not see immediate results. As it says on the bottle, it takes about a month for those taking this product to truly witness any benefits. I am on my fourth container of this and plan to continue buying!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Healed My Bursitis!!
customer_reviews.text: I am buying my second order of this product. After 2 teaspoons in my coffee every morning and 1 teaspoon in my water at night..three weeks faithfully my severe bursitis in both shoulders completely went away. I can now raise my arms up and behind my back. So if anyone you know suffers please tell them to give this a try. I am 100% better after a year of intense pain.My second order is only to continue the other benefits this product offers. I studied it and it really does help lubricate joints!
customer_reviews.author: glynda davis

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this collagen powder a few times before and never had any issues, but this last batch was terrible. First of all when I opened the box there was powder EVERYWHERE! There was no safety seal on the bottle. Once I opened the bottle the seal was open and burnt. It smells bad like it caught on fire. And to make matters worse I cannot return this item to Amazon. They are making me contact the company. I never ordered on the sports research website to begin with I ordered this through Amazon. I am very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Sweat With Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Thicker hair, and much better nails
customer_reviews.text: I put 1 scoop in my coffee each morning. Love it. Prior to adding collagen to my diet, my hair was thin, and my nails broke and chipped. My hair is now growing faster, and thicker, and bonus or not, it's much curlier. I really didn't need more curl, but whatever. In addition, my nails are lovely. If I don't want to wear polish, they are fine without it. I'm not saying everyone will see these results, but it's worth a try to see. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BBF

customer_reviews.title: My skin got a reboot
customer_reviews.text: Within a few days of using it in a daily smoothie I saw great results to my skin. My face felt & looked healthy - it was like my skin got a reboot. I'm sleeping better & have more energy. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product upon arrival. Sealed package has trash (paper) in it. Also, the container was half empty so I measured out the scoops. It contained 34 instead of the 41 it should have had. Since it is not returnable Amazon did offer a refund. I had rather received a quality product instead so now I have to decide if I should try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: rickyculbreth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second container of the peptides. I have hashimoto's. My hair sucks when it comes to growth and breakage. It has grown a full beautiful 2 inches. I drink it every morning in my coffee. There is no taste. I did not get anything free or discounted for my review. I honestly and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Tighter skin in a can
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, some of the science is out, but for me, it’s working. Quick story: In the last year, I’ve lost 150lbs. At 43 years of age, I have no loose skin, and my normal age lines (wrinkles) have began to disappear. I use this product in concert with a quality firming lotion, and I make sure I stay hydrated, but I have no doubt that the collagen peptides are the biggest factor in my success. FYI: This is not a one and done product. You can expect huge results in a couple of doses, but over the course of a few months, you’ll see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Shea T. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Change in Ingredients?
customer_reviews.text: This is great and my arthritis pain is gone but very disappointed went I saw you just went up in price. 😒 **Update***I took this every morning for 4 months and I had never felt better!!! All of my pain was gone and I told everyone about this product and even bought it for some. Now, I would say, the last 3 months of taken this I've went back to arthritis pain, nothing has changed from before taking this. I don't know if they changed their product ingredients or it's me. I'm going to try different kinds. I put 3 stars because I don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this same product before and had loved it. This last order does not dissolve well ...
customer_reviews.text: Did this product change? I have bought this same product before and had loved it. This last order does not dissolve well leaving small gooey chunks and does not mix clear it stays slightly yellowing with a slight taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother buying!
customer_reviews.text: I have never experienced worse cramping and pain before from taking a product. I do not recommend at all. Waste of money that made me stop taking it after 4 days of using. Stomach pain and cramps just keep getting consistently worse, almost as if you had food poisoning.
customer_reviews.author: stefaye

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction to this brand
customer_reviews.text: I was ver excited to receive the product after the great reviews. But unfortunately I broke out in hives after ingesting it. I had to go to urgent care for steroid shot. I was scratching like crazy. Just wanted you to know my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Browngirl

customer_reviews.title: actually works
customer_reviews.text: I heard about collagen from a Kathy Smith podcast and decided to give it a try. I really can tell a difference in my joints. I was hoping for a miracle face-lift from taking it, and I do seem to have a bit more pep to my skin, but, alas, I am still 52! BUT, my knees, chronic shoulder injury pain and back really do feel better!! I also found it easier lately to lose weight. Don't know if that's attributed to collagen but it certainly isn't hurting.
customer_reviews.author: RJD Pipsmom

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves wonderfully into my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves wonderfully into my morning coffee. I have been using for 1.5 months now and can really tell a difference in my knees as well as my hair is thicker and my nails have grown faster.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Product is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on my third ( and last) bottle of this collagen. I am giving it 1 star because the quality of the product has been inconsistent. The texture, solubility, and even the color have been different all three times. This third bottle is by far the worst, it does not dissolved ( I put it in my morning coffee) and has made my face breakout like crazy. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Same product, looks different
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help with hair loss. I also ordered the same item for my mom to help with joint pain. When the second tub arrived I noticed that the tub was bigger. Upon opening it I noticed that it’s more yellow in color and finer in texture than the one I received. The scoop is also different. I don’t understand why the same product, same amount comes in different sized tubs, with different scoops, and are different in color??? I’ve only taken it a few weeks so I can’t say if it works yet. I will add to my review after I finish the product to see if it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: 34 servings Not 41 servings
customer_reviews.text: What I like this protein is tasteless. I mix 1 scoop with my morning coffee. The first order almost finished so I placed my second order. When I received my second order, I opened the container and realized the amount of the powder was not like the first order and right away I remember about complaints in the reviews regarding the amount. So... I counted scoop by scoop and there are only 34 servings NOT 41 servings. For the second order I did subscribe and save instead of one time purchase. I don't know the reason why the amount is not exactly what as stated on the container. Need explanation from the company.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: First batch was ok. Subsequent batches were horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my current collagen protein with something a little more affordable. This one seemed to fit the bill. The first batch tasted fine, it was a little clumpier and harder to mix, but it tasted like what you would expect out of a collagen protein. However, subsequent deliveries of the protein must have been rotten. That’s the only explanation I have for the horrendous taste and smell once mixed with water.
customer_reviews.author: MsSqwerl

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent formula?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product three times. The first two I received an excellent product. The collagen powder was an off-white mix, a tad grainy, but dissolved in my coffee perfectly. This last batch is bright white and much more powdery. It gets sticky and clumps and has an odd after-taste almost like it was mixed with whey. I’m hoping they didn’t change the formula and I just got an off batch. May still try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: SHoov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect supplement! Honestly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect supplement! Honestly! My hair, skin and nails are better than ever! Will continue to use! Helpful hint to everyone with your "My hands are too small for the container" first world problems, dump it into a container that you find easy for your tiny hands to open. Dump it into a freezer bag. Use your heads. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: liane

customer_reviews.title: Their skin looks great, their hair looks healthy and their achy joints ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents over 60. Their skin looks great, their hair looks healthy and their achy joints gone! They take it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Girl

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to enjoy this in my morning smoothies
customer_reviews.text: really wanted to enjoy this in my morning smoothies. I heard the benefits are great. tried many times. Tried very small amounts. took several weeks break and tried again. This stuff just ripped up my digestion terrible. Taking chewable gummies now instead with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: mmlyssa1

customer_reviews.title: Like, all day
customer_reviews.text: I'm on Day 4 and MAN does this stuff cause some serious gas. Like, all day. It's embarrassing. I'm down to 1/2 scoop, hoped it would make a difference, but...nope. Someone else recommended reducing to 1/4 scoop, but wondering if that's even going to have any positive effect. Did anyone else have gas on this stuff? My husband tried it for 3 days and he can't tolerate it...says it tears up his stomach. So bummed, I was really hoping to reap the benefits the rest of you are enjoying!
customer_reviews.author: Leo812

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in water
customer_reviews.text: Weighed it and it is correct for all of those that are saying there isn't anything in the container. BUT I put it in my coffee, and it most definitely makes my coffee taste weird. So to really get an idea of what it tastes like I made a half in warm water and added ice. Holy crap does it taste bad, and is exactly what is making my coffee taste weird. It leaves an awful taste/smell in my mouth/throat. I would recommend finding capsule form or trying a flavored version. Haven't been using it long enough to see any benefits yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jame

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be effective
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time ordering this. A skin issue I had (an ugly dry scaly patch on my face) has completely cleared up. I can move my shoulders much more easily than I have been able to do for several years. I'm going to continue using this for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: BLOWING IN THE WIND
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 1 week. SO MUCH BLOATING it is actually painful. Almost worse than a lactose intolerant attack. I'm not sure why people use this as a weight-loss product as I am trying to gain weight and this product didn't do anything to reduce my appetite, in spite of the horrendous bloating. Oh, and can't leave the house because of all the wind you're going to blowing to relieve the bloating. Also, I used only a quarter scoop so....I can only imagine the pain I would be in. The last time I used this was 36 hours again and still feel bloated and am passing gas like there's no tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came half empty
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on Prime Day - opened the container and it was half empty (see photo). I weighed it and it was 12 ounces (including container). It was advertised as having16 ounces of powder. Not happy at all and won’t be purchasing this again. There are too many great collagen powders on the market for this product to come half empty.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Never itched so much in my life!
customer_reviews.text: It took me too long to realize this is what was causing my severe allergic reaction. I blamed it on so many other things before I started ruling out everything else. I mean I itched all over my entire body! I was miserable for a week before I discovered this was the cause. I bought this for post partum hair loss and didn’t notice a difference there, however it did help my nails grow strong enough to scratch my body raw from all the itching it caused. I’ve had such a bad reaction I don’t think I’ll even try a different brand. I’d rather have thin hair than be this miserably itchy!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this product makes!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference this product makes. I tried it initially for bone and joint support and after just a couple of weeks, my joint pain is significantly diminished with improved range of motion. As an added bonus, my skin feels so much smoother and elastic and fine lines disappeared. Honestly, I was startled to see the improvement in my skin and nails. My hair is shinier and thicker with noticeably less hair loss. Full disclosure, I’m a grandmother suffering from arthritis and fibromyalgia and would recommend this product for improved quality of life (check with your doctor to be sure it’s right for you). I'm ordering more right now!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Made my hip hurt
customer_reviews.text: I noticed after I started using this that I got extreme pain in my hip joint. I ended up reading reviews that said that some people can have a bad reaction with joint pain. So disappointed. Hip pain went away as soon as I stopped using it. I would like a refund, but I passed the deadline. I would appreciate the refund.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Difference in my 56 Year Old Skin
customer_reviews.text: So at my age, I am attacking my skincare issues from the inside out. I purchased this a few weeks ago and already see a noticeable difference in the texture and shine of my skin. My joints don't ache as much either. I'm really looking forward to seeing what a few months of taking this product will do for me. I mix this in with hot tea each night and you cannot taste it AT ALL. It also has 10 grams of protein that fills me up so I don't eat at night. I've lost a few pounds so this product has been a blessing in more ways than one.
customer_reviews.author: Wrenspirit

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Not the product I thought I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this product for about a year and the constistency of this last container is completely different than the rest. I do not believe this product is what it is supposed to be. Only buying from a reputable store from here on. I’ve read about purchases for health & beauty products being a scam and it’s scary wondering what I’m putting into my body.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: my nails and hair are growing like crazy. I thought it would help clear up ...
customer_reviews.text: my nails and hair are growing like crazy. I thought it would help clear up my face but that is still wrecked from menopausal hormones
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Davey

customer_reviews.title: I tried this for a month and saw such improvements ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for a month and saw such improvements! My nails were the strongest they have ever been a little TMI but I was the most regular I have ever been. I then tried to find a cheaper alternative and tried the nature's bounty hair skin and nails for a month, my nails are back to being so brittle and peeling!!! I am ordering my second container of this stuff right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff! Doesn't have a bad taste and mixes well with liquid. I just use water and drink it up! I have had amazing results as well. I was taking it for an injured knee , but it has helped in other areas. No more heartburn, headaches have vanished and I no longer feel those low blood sugar crashes. I was discussing this with a doctor friend and he mentioned that collagen can help heal the gut, so in experiencing all of this, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fina

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated product!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this product, I saw a black speck. After photographing and enlarging the speck, it appears to be the body of an insect without its legs. I also saw a white insect in the photo! Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: ICrawford

customer_reviews.title: RESEARCH the side effects
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I am a supplement junkie and I absolutely research everything I take for a good while before purchasing. I thought this would be a winner. Long story short, the side effects include heartburn, gastrointestinal distress and liver damage. My entire gut is messed up and I stopped one week ago. Also, the feeling of fullness that it gives you is uncomfortable. I have hives over my stomach and back. It was a wake up call to me to look at ALL of my supplements and to take only what I know is effective and cut out the unnecessary. This is not only totally unnecessary, it was hurting me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have noticed my skin and nails are so much better. My knee has also stopped hurting and when I took a break from having the collagen for 3 weeks, my knee pain came back. After taking it again for 3 days, the pain is gone. I am so fortunate my friend recommended this to me. I also appreciate that when there was a broken seal on one of the 3 packages I ordered, it was immediately replaced and my account credited. I am a loyal customer, thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: DeSunshine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a different brand than the original collagen I started taking, but as an old lady 😁 this is the first time in my life I've ever had fingernails. Granted, it took six months of collagen for me to realize my nails were no longer splitting and peeling, but now my nails look as if they're fake they are so long!
customer_reviews.author: Skylover

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my coffee every morning and then put it in my NutriBullet and it tastes so good. It makes my coffee more creamy so I completely stopped using creamer. It has DRASTICALLY made my hair and nails grow so much that I’m having to get my nails done every 2 weeks vs 4 weeks and my hair done every 4 weeks vs 6 weeks. I’m a hairstylist so I tell every client struggling with hair growth about this collagen. I buy a 16oz every 6 weeks so I decided to buy the big canister of it this time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second container of this! I use once a day in my coffee and there is absolutely no taste and no change of consistency. I have noticed that my skin is healthier.my fine thin hair even seems to be thicker! I am fighting the aging skin from the inside out, which I hear is the only way really. Lot of water and Collagen Peptides for me, 51 years old and still no wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: Jules Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: I finished 40 days of this and I love the stuff
customer_reviews.text: I finished 40 days of this and I love the stuff. I have always died my hair really light blond and have been growing out my natural color and it was just growing so slowly and looked horrible. In the past month my growth has been noticeably faster. My nails are stronger too. I could originally taste the powder in my room temperature water and cold drinks. I started adding it to my coffee and couldn't taste it and it dissolved great. I'd suggest using it in warm beverages!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Made spleen hurt
customer_reviews.text: I felt weirdly sick on this product. I've used numerous collagen powders with no ill effect. This one made me feel like I was about to break out in shingles. Like strange tenderness in nerve endings around waist, and tenderness in spleen. Made a smoothie to put it in, gave the same thing to a friend who was visiting. Later in the day I mentioned I was feeling kind of not okay after doing this stuff, she said the same thing. Her spleen was hurting. What the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Step Lively

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product, while taking it I had more consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, while taking it I had more consistent quality bowel movements, and faster recovery time from athlete level workouts. BUT removing one star for value. The Price has steadily INCREASED since my first order in FEB 2017. In the SPAN of 3 MONTHS my first order was for twenty via promo. The second order was for twenty five. Now they are charging almost twenty eight. That's quite the percentage increase.
customer_reviews.author: NoBull

customer_reviews.title: Not pure enough...
customer_reviews.text: I thought collagen was collagen. But as someone with autoimmune issues including but not limited to celiac disease...I had to switch to a brand with a more pure form of collagen. This brand caused me severe hives and swelling in my throat. The Great Lakes brand is what all my autoimmune books recommended for powder collagen. I got that and use daily with zero issues...so if you are using to heal from any digestive issues you really don't want this brand. Stick with Great Lakes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Is this even collagen?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking collagen for a year now to help with my back pain, nails, and hair. When I run out, my back pain comes back within a few days. I decided to try this brand because it was cheaper than the perfect collagen I was on (and having great results). Both brands dissolved easily without clumps. However, after taking this collagen every morning for a couple of weeks, my daily back pain has returned and my nails are brittle again. On the other collagen, I couldn't even bend my nails because they were so strong. I'm disappointed in this brand and will be going back to perfect collagen. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this switched to this brand !
customer_reviews.text: For many years I used vital proteins which is awesome brand and still love , but I switched to using this brand and love love love
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: If you are
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff..... I’m 40 and have zero crows feet..... no forehead lines and it has cleared up my hormonal chin acne..... I drink either a coffee or detox tea with one scoop once a day and this is the one thing... I will not do without...... I wear no makeup only sunscreen.... This product is a must for women 30 or older.....
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Digestion issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in May 2018 and have tried several times to use it. Unfortunately, it makes me very bloated, gassy and all around uncomfortable. I was hoping so badly that this would help with my knees and shoulder pain, but I cannot stomach the supplement enough to feel any positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!  2nd container of this is totally different than the first
customer_reviews.text: I received this and started using it. The first scoop made my hot tea a milky color and tasted like fish. I sent a message to them to ask what we could do to fix this situation since my first container was wonderful.... crickets...no response at all. My first container was great, no color change in my tea and no flavor what so ever! So disappointing that they can't even respond to my inquiry. Had to throw this second container away because it was not tolerable/palatable in any way. I thought the container was labeled wrong and put onto a marine collagen product.
customer_reviews.author: harley~girl

customer_reviews.title: Love my results!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I've been using it for about three months now. Like many "older" women, I've been dealing with thinning hair. Just this past week I noticed lots of new, fine hairs growing! They're about an inch long, but they're there. I also received two compliments recently on my complexion, never expected that! I started out with one scoop per day in my morning coffee but now use one scoop in the morning and one at night.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Will keep using this and update as. Needed
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! What happened to my chicken neck!!!! Fantastic side effect for the real reason I bought this stuff- to help my knee and joint pain. I’m on about day 5 of this stuff. Not much change in pain levels yet but seriously though my neck really looks about 15 years younger- I had some major vertical wrinkling going on. It looks much better now. I use about 2/3 scoop in my morning coffee and I can’t taste it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Not so fast..
customer_reviews.text: I gave this two stars because I have ordered it in the last year and have had no issues. The last order I received — something has gone wrong. It is the most foul tasting, nasty powder I have ever tasted (supposed to be unflavored. It’s super granulated- which hasn’t been the case in the past. Either way, I can’t stomach another order to replace this if I just got a bad batch. It’s pretty bad. Going to be switching to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on my second order of this product due to the statement that one should consume product for 45-60 days to feel a difference.. I had high hopes after reading so many great reviews and this seemed to be highly rated.. BUT.... After 58 days of daily use I have to say this product is garbage.... No change in aches, my hair, skin and nails are still the same, nothing noticeably different at all.. The only apparent true fact of this product, that it does dissolve well and little to no taste.. Other wise its a complete waste of money.. -Mrs. W.M.
customer_reviews.author: W.M.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: In pre-menopause and started suffering dry skin issues, bone issues and what not. I am almost done with my first order and yes it does work. I have been working out now and do not experience the pain and stiffness I used to experience before. Even my back has more flexibility now then it used to. Earlier small workout would make my back stiff. My skin does not feel as dry either, in fact, seems its going back to how it was before I hit pre-menopause. Will wait to see long term effect.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Its actually works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Ive been getting thin hair, and have never been able to grow my nails because they were always so thin and fragile. Now my nails after 3 weeks have grown and are hard and not breaking 🤘
customer_reviews.author: Chike U.

customer_reviews.title: Works well... really well, but tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: If this was actually tasteless I would have given it 5 stars but I have to drink it with my nose plugged and a chaser on hand, it’s like drinking glue - it disgusting. BUT after only 1 month the results are obvious. My goal was to tighten the skin in my midsection created by working out. I wouldn’t have believed if if I hadn’t taken before and after pics. Will continue to use and in the future will try the pill form instead of powder.
customer_reviews.author: TKCFT

customer_reviews.title: The only one you need
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal. I’m very pleased with my purchase! It’s been 7 days since I’ve started using this in all my hot liquids. My skin looks amazing already! I can also feel a difference in my joints. Fibromyalgia pain has eased up a little. My doctor recommended this item to help me rebuild the collagen in my stomach lining due to acid reflux and GERD. So far, so good. This product dissolves quickly in my morning coffee and afternoon hot tea. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Ann Willis

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about two weeks it absolutely did not work. I switched to this product from a cheaper product. When I was taking the cheaper product my nails were growing and hair. My skin was glowing and my knees did not sound like pop crackle pop. With this product all of those benefits ceased. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shon Tabora

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Used to be great, but it’s not the same product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product before. It was tasteless and it was a very fine, white powder. Something changed and it is no longer the same. I ordered last month and it wasn’t the same, so I returned the product and they sent me a new one that was what I was used to. I ordered this month and it wasn’t the same again. It was yellowish in color and gritty. It looked like baby formula. I returned and they sent me a new one and it is still bad. Returning and finding a new company. Something changed and it’s definitely not for the better. I’m not sure what happened but I’m scared to put the new product in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of this, we love it! My husband and I really noticed a difference in our skin looking more supple/less 'wrinkles' around the eyes, etc. He even noticed some baby hairs coming back in his hairline, which seems to be attributed to taking the collagen daily. I add it to coffee or my morning shakes, he stirs it into his morning juices. Mixes really well and is flavorless. We work out a lot and live active lifestyles and we feel this supplement is a great addition to our daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle_86

customer_reviews.title: My hair was dull, brittle
customer_reviews.text: I am a 67 years old woman. My hair was dull, brittle, and thinning and my fingernails were constantly peeling. After using this supplement mixed with my daily afternoon coffee, my hair is shiny and soft again. My fingernails are strong and growing so fast that I need to clip them nearly every week.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Gallen

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your daily regime!
customer_reviews.text: This has become a staple in my regime! It’s made with No GMO ingredients either. I’ve seen such a difference in hair and nail growth. Not to mention what’s it’s been doing to help my dehydrated skin to look better. I strongly suggest being consistent in order to see a change. This has been a part of my daily routine for 2 years and won’t use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifly

customer_reviews.title: Longer hair, more supple skin, no knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My hair is thin and damaged, and I have to keep cutting it in order for it the remain healthy. I’ve literally been trying to grow my hair out for the last decade, but I just can’t get it there because I use heat on my hair, and I have to keep trimming. This supplement has really sped up the pace that my hair grows so it’s finally getting long! Thank goodness! I’ve also noticed that my 32 y.o. skin is more supple and full like a 22 y.o. Also, I’m a runner that’s worn a knee brace for years. I no longer have to because my right knee joint no longer hurts!
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: Taste and Bioavailability
customer_reviews.text: As a clinical nutritionist, Collagen hydrolysate has long been a great alternative source for connective tissue support, even more so in elderly adults. With this in mind, my review is more focused on taste and bioavailability for some clients. Unlike other products from Design for Health and Great Lakes. This product has a strong taste. The GI impact is good, but could stress some elderly who have low / mild forms of gut dysfunction.
customer_reviews.author: MG63

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: When I first started with the Collagen I was very skeptical. I was proven wrong. My joints feel better. Hair and nails look better. This is not instant, I noticed around the first month after starting the Collagen. I put a scoop in my tea every day. If you take vitamin C it will increase the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I could cry.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going completely bald when my friend told me about this product. Have been using it for only 3 weeks. What a difference.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredProf

customer_reviews.title: Acne
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for 7 days. It has given me stomach upset, nausea and severe acne. Everyone is different and this is just my reaction to it. It seems to work for a lot of people. I switched to another brand in capsule form. The capsules are working better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aingeni

customer_reviews.title: Great for Joint Pain
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this product before I wrote a review. Definitely have seen an improvement in joint pain and skin is a lot more hydrated. It does have a mild unpleasant taste but if mixed in Juice, tea or coffee you will not taste it at all. I had used the Great Lakes collagen powder before and saw good results but I could not continue to consume it due to the taste, this product taste is much less unpleasant. I drink mine with water. I exercise alot and have noticed faster recovery time with muscles. I would definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other collagen powders, but this is my favorite. It dissolves well in both cold and hot liquids. There is no taste that I can detect. I have been taking it for 2 months and people keep commenting on how long my hair is getting and how shiny it is. I can tell it is helping my skin, as it feels softer and is less dry. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: hospicern

customer_reviews.title: Give it a chance! You have nothing to lose!!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first 16 ounce tub and have noticed a difference in my skin and joints. I'm in my mid fifties and have noticed my face seems to have less fine lines and wrinkles. I also have had issues with bursitis in my feet and they are remarkably improved. Maybe it's a coincidence that I'm feeling and looking better but why take a chance. I'll be using another 16 ounce tub of the Collagen Peptides and see what happens. FYI I put it in my hot coffee and it has no taste and no texture difference than my usual coffee.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Its been 30 days since I started taking the Collagen in my coffee every morning, and I have to say "WOW". I already see a difference in my skin. My skin is smooth and my light wrinkles have slightly disappeared. I am looking forward what this stuff can do for my hair, which grows at a slower pace then the norm. Good Stuff and will repurchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: Tried high end collagen sold for much higher prices and they tasted gross and did not see the effects I see with this one!! This brand is the best! It has NO taste! I put in water with ice and lime and go. My skin on face and skin on fingers has had a huge change for better. Less breaking out and less dryness on fingers. Hair looks better too
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Tried for two months. Did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how most of the reviews get here and are so positive. I bought the product, take as recommended everyday for two months and I see absolutely nothing. Nothing like what I’ve read in the reviews. I cannot say it helps me with skin, hair, or nails or the painful joints. Because it did not. Very disappointed because I was looking forward to something good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: RESULT YOU CAN SEE WITHIN WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully after baking on beaches for decades, I’m still blessed with great skin. I already had a glow to my skin but after starting drinking this collagen peptide my skin my skin is so bright is really glows, smooth as glass and younger looking. I was drinking another collagen peptide from Amazon but it had farm raised Tilapia as protein. Trashed immediately. I was taking beauty caps, made by a celebrity Plastic Surgeon on TV with his RHWof OC for two years, expensive with no visible results. This doesn’t taste great in water, how I drink it but so worth result.

customer_reviews.title: Love Yourself and Get This
customer_reviews.text: I use this just about everyday in my morning coffee. I have noticed a difference in my skin and nails! (I also eat healthy and work out regularly, there is no shortcut to being healthy). I have had no issue with it not dissolving or leaving a "weird" taste. My coffee tastes no different. I pour my coffee first, then add a scoop and stir really good and am on my way. For those that don't drink coffee, I have put it in water too. I made sure the water was room temp first, then added my scoop and stirred really well then added ice. Still did not notice a difference in taste or texture.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Proven to work time and time again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far! Almost a month of use and have only been putting a scoop into my morning coffee. Just realized you can do up to 2 a day. So far... my hair has stopped falling out and my nails are amazingly strong and growing nicely. I normally don’t grow nails as they have always been weak. BTW- I am in my mid 40’s and after reading the reviews of how we need to add collagen into our daily lives I had to try. Absolutely not disappointed. I think this may be my first review for any product and although the reviews states this is amazing- thought I would confirm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! *** BEWARE OF FAKE***
customer_reviews.text: *****EDIT***** BEWARE OF FAKES!!! the third tub I received has to be a fake. They did not have the safety pull tab and the safety paper under the cover was torn. Powder was all over the container. I included pictures to show the containers were different. I put one scoop of Collagen Peptides into my coffee every morning. It mixes easy and there is no taste. Since I've been drinking this product my hair feels thicker, my nails are harder and grow longer without breaking, and my skin and face are noticeably smoother. I have also noticed the pain in my back and leg due to an inflamed static nerve has gone away. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy P..

customer_reviews.title: The product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this Collagen twice. The first time was a good experience. The second container clumped when I put it in my smoothies and had a grassy taste. My burps left a grassy taste in my throat and on my tongue. I've still got the container but will throw it out. I am taking the Vital Proteins collagen and there's no after taste or smell and it stirs in well in hot or cold drinks with no clumps. I don't know what happened but this product has changed and I'll not purchase it ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Thegoodgurl

product_meta.title: Collagen Peptides Powder | Non-GMO Verified, Certified Paleo Friendly and Gluten Free - Unflavored (16oz Jar)
feature_bullets: YOU NEED MORE COLLAGEN: Collagen is one of the most important nutrients needed to ensure the health and vitality of your skin, hair, tendon, cartilage, bones, and joints. Around the age of 30, our bodies naturally begin to produce less collagen, and the first signs of aging start to occur.*

HOW TO TAKE: Consume in warm or room temperature water. Can also be added to Oatmeal, Yogurt, Soups or Sauces. *Helpful Hack: To enjoy in cold water without clumping, mix collagen in room temperature water first, then add ice.
REAL CERTIFICATIONS: Many companies claim to be, but our Collagen Powder is actually 3rd party certified by the Paleo & Keto Foundation, and non-GMO verified by the IGEN program.
IMPORTANT NOTE: Product packaging may Vary. Collagen Peptides is a Protein and Individuals who consume an excessive amount of Protein in their diet may experience bloating and diarrhea.
90 DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you don't see results within 90 days, simply return your product for a refund (^See details below).
